Wurt Dumire was a tyrant ruling the goblin realm of the Kingdom of Nix in the Utter East during the time of the Bloodforge Wars (648â€“657 DR).
In the aftermath of Redfang the Reapers reign, Wurt Dumire came to enslave the goblins of Nix, putting them to work in a far-off mine. The leader of the Legendary Campaign felt unexpected sympathy for the goblins plight and was compelled to try to bring an end to Wurts operation in a bloodforge battle in Nix itself.
